system.appearance: Just like a normal spider, but about the size of a @L[Creature:Horse]{horse}.

overview.proficient: You instead climb at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{normal speed}.

overview.base: You vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{quarter speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed}.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed}.

overview.base: You @L[Keyword:Resistance]{resist} @L[Condition:Unconscious]{unconsciousness} and @L[Condition:Down]{dropping} due to being at negative @L[Core:HP]{HP}. You still @L[Condition:Dead]{die} when you reach half your maximum @L[Core:HP]{HP} below zero.

Your @L[Equipment:Mouth]{mouth} counts as a @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
You can see in the dark up to 60 feet as though it is dim light.

results.hit: Target is @L[Condition:Dead]{dead}, @L[Condition:Ruined]{ruined}, and their @L[Core:Size]{SIZE} is reduced by 1. If their @L[Core:Size]{SIZE} was already less than 1, it is reduced to 0.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Beastly Strength]{Beastly Strength} and @L[Ability:Improved Armor Piercing]{Improved Armor Piercing}.

Can wield @L[Property:Two-Handed]{two-handed} weapons in one hand.
Note: @L[Property:AP]{AP} weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.
Melee weapons you use are @L[Property:Armor Piercing]{armor piercing}.
You always have at least 2 @L[Core:AV]{AV}. This is the case even when you are not wearing @L[Category:Armor]{armor}.
You cannot use items in your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands}.

results.critHit: The target automatically fails the first [[/roll 2d4]] roll.

system.endCondition: At the end of each of the target's @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.
At the start of each of the target's @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.
At the end of each of the target's @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.
